item.title: Flare-On 2022 - Flaredle
item.description: Challenge Description Welcome to Flare-On 9 You probably won’t win. Maybe you’re like us and spent the year playing Wordle. We made our own version that is too hard to beat without cheating Play it live at: http://flare-on.com/flaredle/ Challenge Overview Upon loading the website we are presented with some sort of Wordle game. Dynamic Analysis When testing the app it seems that it only accepts words with a minimum length. After some testing we can see that the length required is 21 characters, upon reaching the length the error message becomes “Word not in list!
